title: Photo Alert: Karisma Kapoor & Kareena Kapoor Shopping In London

organizations.name: karisma kapoor & kareena kapoor shopping in london swagata dam mar

text:
Swagata Dam Mar . 30 . 2017 
Yesterday, we shared a photo of Karisma Kapoor â€˜s night out with with Rhea Kapoor and a bunch of their other girlfriends in London. And now, Lolo has shared a picture with her shopping buddy, Kareena Kapoor . See the two sisters striking a pose while indulging in some retail therapy in London. A post shared by KK (@therealkarismakapoor) on Mar 30, 2017 at 1:56am PDT 
Picture perfect. The Kapoor sisters never cease to exude swag! 0
